org.gridgain.grid.loaders.tomcat
Class GridTomcatLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.loaders.tomcat.GridTomcatLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.catalina.LifecycleListener
@GridLoader(description="Tomcat loader")
public class GridTomcatLoader
extends Object
implements org.apache.catalina.LifecycleListener

This is GridGain loader implemented as Tomcat LifecycleListener. Tomcat loader should be used to provide tight integration between GridGain and Tomcat. Specifically, Tomcat loader integrates GridGain with Tomcat logging and MBean server.

The following steps should be taken to configure this loader:

  1. Add GridGain libraries in Tomcat common loader. Add in file ${TOMCAT_HOME}/conf/catalina.properties for property common.loader the following ${GRIDGAIN_HOME}/gridgain.jar,${GRIDGAIN_HOME}/libs/*.jar (replace ${GRIDGAIN_HOME} with absolute path).
  2. Add GridGain LifeCycle Listener in ${TOMCAT_HOME}/conf/server.xml 
                  <Listener className="org.gridgain.grid.loaders.tomcat.GridTomcatLoader"
                  configurationFile="config/default-spring.xml"/>

Note: Tomcat is not shipped with GridGain. If you don't have Tomcat, you need to download it separately. See http://tomcat.apache.org/ for more information.
